manifest.name: Enhanced Canvas
manifest.description: When creating links on Canvas, automatically add properties and Markdown links to notes. A command automatically creates canvas links based on Markdown links, and it adjusts all links to use the shortest path.
manifest.author: RobertttBS

data.manifestValue: When creating links on Canvas, automatically add properties and Markdown links to notes. A command automatically creates canvas links based on Markdown links, and it adjusts all links to use the shortest path.
data.communityListValue: Syncs Canvas node connections with properties in note, automating document relationship management.
